statements: SELECT * FROM recycling_rates ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT bin_id, recycling_rate FROM recycling_rates WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM recycling_rates;
SELECT * FROM recycling_rates WHERE bin_id = 10;
SELECT AVG(recycling_rate) AS avg_rate FROM recycling_rates;
SELECT bin_id, recycling_rate, date FROM recycling_rates WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT bin_id, AVG(recycling_rate) AS average_rate FROM recycling_rates GROUP BY bin_id HAVING AVG(recycling_rate) > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM recycling_rates WHERE bin_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND recycling_rate <= 0.4 ORDER BY bin_id ASC, recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT bin_id, MAX(recycling_rate) AS max_rate, MIN(recycling_rate) AS min_rate FROM recycling_rates GROUP BY bin_id;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, AVG(recycling_rate) AS average_rate FROM recycling_rates WHERE bin_id = 2 GROUP BY formatted_date ORDER BY formatted_date ASC;
SELECT bin_id, location, recycling_rate, collection_date FROM recycling_bin_data;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bin_data WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT location, recycling_rate FROM recycling_bin_data WHERE collection_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT trend_id, year, trend_description FROM recycling_trends WHERE trend_value < 0.0;
SELECT * FROM recycling_trends WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bin_data WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT bin_id, location FROM recycling_bin_data WHERE recycling_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT location, recycling_rate FROM recycling_bin_data WHERE bin_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT AVG(recycling_rate) AS average_rate FROM recycling_bin_data;
SELECT trend_description, trend_value FROM recycling_trends WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY trend_value DESC, trend_description ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT location, capacity FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM recycling_materials WHERE recyclable = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM recycling_rates WHERE recycling_rate >= 0.5 ORDER BY collected_date ASC;
SELECT bin_id, last_empty_date FROM recycling_bins WHERE location LIKE 'City%';
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins
SELECT location, capacity FROM recycling_bins WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT r.material_name, rr.recycling_rate FROM recycling_materials r INNER JOIN recycling_rates rr ON r.material_id = rr.material_id WHERE rr.recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY rr.recycling_rate DESC
SELECT bin_id, location, last_emtpy_date FROM recycling_bins WHERE last_emtpy_date IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM recycling_materials WHERE material_type IS NULL
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins;
SELECT bin_id, location, recycle_type FROM recycling_bins WHERE recycle_type = 'plastic';
SELECT MAX(weight_kg) AS max_weight FROM recycling_bins;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_bins FROM recycling_bins GROUP BY location;
SELECT center_id, location, contact_person FROM recycling_centers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_bins ORDER BY bin_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, recycle_type FROM recycling_bins WHERE weight_kg > 100 ORDER BY weight_kg ASC;
SELECT bin_id, location, recycle_type, DATE(timestamp) AS collection_date FROM recycling_bins WHERE recycle_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycle_statistics JOIN recycling_bins ON recycle_statistics.bin_id = recycling_bins.bin_id WHERE quantity_collected > 500 ORDER BY quantity_collected DESC;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date, trend_analysis FROM recycling_trends WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingBins;
SELECT bin_id, location FROM RecyclingBins WHERE weight_kg > 100;
SELECT category_name, company_name FROM RecyclingCategories, RecyclingCompanies WHERE category_id = company_id;
SELECT year, rate FROM RecyclingRates WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingTrends WHERE rate >= 3.50 AND year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingBins WHERE location = 'Central Park';
SELECT location, weight_kg FROM RecyclingBins WHERE weight_kg > 100 ORDER BY weight_kg DESC;
SELECT r.company_name, c.category_name FROM RecyclingCompanies r JOIN RecyclingCategories c ON r.company_id = c.category_id;
SELECT MAX(rate) AS highest_rate FROM RecyclingRates WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT t.year, SUM(t.rate) AS total_rate FROM RecyclingTrends t GROUP BY t.year HAVING total_rate > 50 ORDER BY total_rate DESC;
